Source.Name: mongo-tools
Source.Summary: MongoDB tools provide import, export, and diagnostic capabilities.
Source.Description: The MongoDB tools include: bsondump, mongoimport, mongoexport, mongodump, mongorestore, mongostat, mongofiles, mongooplog, mongotop.

Package.Name: mongo-tools
Package.Summary: MongoDB tools provide import, export, and diagnostic capabilities.
Package.Description: The MongoDB tools include: bsondump, mongoimport, mongoexport, mongodump, mongorestore, mongostat, mongofiles, mongooplog, mongotop.
